channel.title: Action Timer
channel.description:
I know how to do a lot with a private server but there is one thing that has always stumped me.. People like to exploit the in-game action timers by loggin out then back in. I tried numerous times to fix this and failed each time. I guess what i want is to have my server save the action timer with the person's character file so that they can't exploit it. If you can help thanks!
I would also like something like this for the special attack bar too. Just saying...

item.title: Action Timer
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

search in your client.java

savegame

you should see things like

token

and similar things that are written in character files.

You just add the timer name
ex

actionDelay

along with them on its own line.

Same thing with the special attack bar.

Read full topic
